member_organisations: We are the regional equivalent to a trade and industry development agency, wholly owned by the City of Göteborg.
fields_of_interest: Trade, Culture, Energy, Business and Industry, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Digital economy and society, Transport
eu_initiatives:
We follow H2020 and COSME very closely. 
We are new members of DG Connect Digital Skills and Jobs Coalition. 
Our EU Affairs Representative has acted as evaluator for COSME  with expert ID CT-EX2015D240884-101.  
We are members of the EBN Innovation network
section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
membership:
Eurocities       http://www.eurocities.eu 
 
EBN Innovation network http://ebn.eu 
 
Think Tank Confrontation Europe  http://confrontations.org 
 
Enterprise Europe Network  http://www.enterpriseeurope.se
goals__remit:
Business Region Göteborg AB is dedicated to strengthening and developing trade and industry in the Göteborg region. 
We are a non-profit organization representing 13 member municipalities. Our goal is to contribute to sustainable economic growth, a high level of employment and a diversified economy.
relevant_communication: We are charing Eurocities WG ENTR & SME.
